title: Women Sleeveless Sexy V Neck Bodycon Mini Dress Summer Side Slit Mesh Irregular Ruffle Hem Backless Short Dress
description: 【Fabric】The bodycon mini dress is made of 92% polyamide and 8% elastane, skin friendly, soft and highly stretch, light and breathable, not see-through, comfortable to wear, easy to dress up and down, so you can stay cool and fashionable.

【Features】Mesh bodycon dress for women, sexy deep v-neck, sleeveless, backless, split ruffle hem, mesh irregular ruffle hem, mini length, solid colour, slim fit design to show your sexy body curve. This sundress is adorned with side slit ruffle trim fringe, adding a romantic and playful element to your look.

【Occasions】Side slit ruffle hem mesh mini dress is perfect for cocktail, party, dating, clubwear, club, night out, going out, birthday, weeding, homecoming, beach, vacation, shopping, casual everyday, etc. The mini bodycon dress exudes elegance and sweet, romantic feeling of summer, dance the night away in ethereal beauty with the split hem mini dress.

【Match】Casual backless mesh short dress is the perfect summer dress to keep you looking trendy. Sexy and elegant side slit bodycon mini dress is great to pair with your favourite high heels, boots, necklaces, earrings, handbags for a charming look.
【Garment Care】Recommended hand wash cold/do not bleach/line dry. Please refer to the size chart in the product description as below before ordering this Women's Irregular Ruffle Dress.
